nodes.text: During the Battle of Christophsis, the Galactic Republic captured the western district of Chaleydonia, the capital city of the planet Christophsis. The Republic forces, under the command of Jedi Generals Anakin Skywalker and Obi-Wan Kenobi, encountered little resistance when capturing the district and its town square, as General Whorm Loathsom's forces had largely abandoned Chaleydonia for the eastern exurbs.
